newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan dollar ends sharply up on overseas trend.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan dollar ends sharply up on overseas trend.

text.p: The Taiwan dollar closed sharply higher on Thursday against its U.S. counterpart, reflecting the greenback's fall overseas against the yen, dealers said.
The local unit ended at T$27.680, against Wednesday's T$27.734 close.
Turnover through dealers was an active US$306 million.
"The yen's sharp rise today boosted the Taiwan dollar, but the local currency still faces profit-taking pressure at this level," said a dealer at a foreign bank.
A T$27.67-71 range was seen for Friday. -- Kevin Chen(5080815)
